name: Window Washer
description:
Work as a window washer to scale and clean a skyscraper as fast as possible! Make sure to avoid obstacles that could impede progress.

Started development in October 2020 in Casual Game Production class at UCF and is being made in Unity. The development team consists of six students. Our driving design decisions came from the parameters that the project must be a hyper casual mobile game.

My role in development is Producer, Designer, and Artist. I came up with the initial idea and design and write all the documents. I organize the team schedule and task list, and I create the UI and screen art with their functionality and implement art assets.
